settings.title: OUR SANCTUARY
settings.richtext: Our brick + mortar gives customers a chance to sway with our kimonos and shop a range of curated wellness products that elevate the everyday. Located in the heart of San Francisco’s Chinatown, KIM + ONO is a modern interior space, lush and astutely edited, creating a welcome respite from the city’s hustle and bustle.

settings.text: Our brick + mortar gives customers a chance to sway with our kimonos and shop a range of curated wellness products that elevate the everyday. Located in the heart of San Francisco’s Chinatown, KIM + ONO is a modern interior space, lush and astutely edited, creating a welcome respite from the city’s hustle and bustle.

settings.title: Come say hello!
settings.text:
Whether you're looking for a silk kimono robe, a plus size kimono robe, or wellness tools, we have something lovely in store for you. Come relax on our velvet couches, take a deep breath, and wander through our airy, modern space.

A perfect spot for gifting, our kimono store has something for everyone. Pick out a favorite men's kimono robe for the man in your life, find holiday gifts for your loved ones, and pick up a silk robe just for you.

Sway into our Grant Avenue location and add a little luxury to your Chinatown visit.

DRAGON PAPA

Come celebrate AAPI month with us and grab some dragon beard candy.

Date: May 28, 2022 (Saturday)
Time: 11am (until sold out)

SENSUAL SIP & SHOP

Join Sexual Empowerment Coach Ann Nguyen, Consicous Sex + Relationship Coach Jo Portia Mayari and The Optimist Collective for a sensual evening workshop full of nourishment and pleasure.

Participants will receive 20% off for KIM+ONO products.

Date: June 14, 2022 (Tuesday)
Time: 6:00 - 8:00 PM

Register Here
